module.name: MERIS Boreal Lakes Processor
module.description:
This processor derives Level 2 water quality parameters of boreal lakes from MERIS Level 1b data.
The processor includes an algorithm for atmospheric correction and an algorithm to derive properties of the water such as the inherent optical properties (IOP's) absorption and scattering and the concentrations of total suspended matter (TSM) and chlorophyll from the water leaving radiance reflectance spectra (i.e. after atmospheric correction).
